title: How can i change the Korean client language to ENG
body:
So I am a US Soldier and I'am stationed in KR i don't speak the language and all i want to do is play my favorite game
i know it could be done because every time pro player travel to Korea they stream and their client is in English.
so how do they do it!

replies.body:
You can select your region, as well as which available language you'd like to use on that region, right under where you enter your password on the client. If Korea doesn't have English listed as an option, then you won't be able to play with English while on the KR server.


https://support.riotgames.com/hc/article_attachments/115008287567/changing-game-language-client-landing.jpg
did you even read my post?? korea never had english listed as an option i want to know how the pros are able to play in korea with a english client

When people are playing in Korea with the English language in their client, it's because they're playing on a server that *does* have English as a supported language. Korea does not have English listed as a possible language so you will not be able to play in English on the Korean server. 

If you do need to play in English, you'll have to play on a server that allows English, which you can find a list on our [**supported languages**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) page.

I have the same problem. I'm only in Korea for 2 months and I don't know Korean. Why wouldn't riot let people use whatever language they want? Most others games allow this. If someone from riot can explain why they won't let us choose any language we want, I'd love to know why. @Broporo
